Pokémon Showdown for Android

Everyone's favorite batle simulator, ported for Android 4.1 and above.

Download
for Android 4.1 and later

Forum page on Smogon • Source on GitHub

Installation

  1. Enable installation from unknown sources on your device (Settings > Security > Unknown Sources)
  2. Download the file with the big button above (current.apk ~5.5MB)
  3. Move said file to your device
  4. Open the file from your device to install it
